languages.text: Прогулка прошла мирно и запомнилась офицерам, обсуждавшим ее недели спустя. Леди Кассия особенно долго провела среди зеркальных скал, то ли любуясь, то ли размышляя о чем-то. А после несколько дней провела в своих покоях за мольбертом. Но холст так и не увидел ни мазка краски.

traits.locale_text: Прогулка прошла мирно и запомнилась офицерам, обсуждавшим ее недели спустя. Леди Кассия особенно долго провела среди зеркальных скал, то ли любуясь, то ли размышляя о чем-то. А после несколько дней провела в своих покоях за мольбертом. Но холст так и не увидел ни мазка краски.

languages.text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Lady Cassia spent a great deal of time in the mirror mountains — one cannot say whether it was in awe or contemplation. Upon her return to the ship, she spent several days in her quarters in front of her easel... but the canvas remained unmarked.
languages.original_text: Прогулка прошла мирно и запомнилась офицерам, обсуждавшим ее недели спустя. Леди Кассия особенно долго провела среди зеркальных скал, то ли любуясь, то ли размышляя о чем-то. А после несколько дней провела в своих покоях за мольбертом. Но холст так и не увидел ни мазка краски.

traits.locale_text: The shore leave was peaceful; the officers went on to discuss it for weeks. Lady Cassia spent hours among the mirror-like mountains — one cannot say whether it was in awe or contemplation. Upon return she stood in front of her easel for hours, palette and brush at the ready... but the canvas remained untouched.

The shore leave was peaceful; the officers went on to discuss it for weeks. Lady Cassia spent hours among the mirror-like mountains — one cannot say whether it was in awe or contemplation. Upon return she stood in front of her easel for hours, palette and brush at the ready... but the canvas remained untouched.

The shore leave was peaceful; the officers went on to discuss it for weeks. Lady Cassia spent hours among the mirror-like mountains — one cannot say whether it was in awe or contemplation. Upon return, she stood in front of her easel for hours, palette and brush at the ready... but the canvas remained unsullied.

The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Lady Cassia spent a great deal of time in the mirror mountains — one cannot say whether it was in awe or contemplation. Upon her return to the ship, she spent several days in her quarters in front of her easel... but the canvas remained unmarked.

The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Lady Cassia spent a great deal of time in the mirror mountains — one cannot say whether it was in awe or contemplation. Upon her return to the ship, she spent several days in her quarters in front of her easel... but the canvas remained unmarked.

The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Lady Cassia spent a great deal of time in the mirror mountains — one cannot say whether it was in awe or contemplation. Upon her return to the ship, she spent several days in her quarters in front of her easel... but the canvas remained unmarked.

languages.text: 岸上的休假风平浪静地结束了。在这之后的几个星期里，船上的军官始终都在谈论这里的奇景。卡西娅女士在镜子般的群山前驻足很久，不知道是在敬畏，还是在沉思。回到船上之后，她在房间的画架前坐了好几天……但画布上却始终空空如也。
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Lady Cassia spent a great deal of time in the mirror mountains — one cannot say whether it was in awe or contemplation. Upon her return to the ship, she spent several days in her quarters in front of her easel... but the canvas remained unmarked.

traits.locale_text: 岸上的休假风平浪静地结束了。在这之后的几个星期里，船上的军官始终都在谈论这里的奇景。卡西娅女士在镜子般的群山前驻足很久，不知道是在敬畏，还是在沉思。回到船上之后，她在房间的画架前坐了好几天……但画布上却始终空空如也。

languages.text: El permiso concluyó sin incidentes, y los oficiales de la nave hablaron sobre ello durante semanas. Lady Cassia pasó mucho tiempo en las montañas espejo, aunque es imposible determinar si estaba fascinada o meditando. Cuando volvió a la nave, pasó días en sus aposentos frente a su caballete... pero el lienzo permaneció intacto.
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Lady Cassia spent a great deal of time in the mirror mountains — one cannot say whether it was in awe or contemplation. Upon her return to the ship, she spent several days in her quarters in front of her easel... but the canvas remained unmarked.

traits.locale_text: El permiso concluyó sin incidentes, y los oficiales de la nave hablaron sobre ello durante semanas. Lady Cassia pasó mucho tiempo en las montañas espejo, aunque es imposible determinar si estaba fascinada o meditando. Cuando volvió a la nave, pasó días en sus aposentos frente a su caballete... pero el lienzo permaneció intacto.

languages.text: 寄港地での休暇は何事もなく過ぎ去り、船員たちはその後何週間もそのことを話していた。カシア嬢は鏡の山で多くの時間を過ごした。それが畏敬の念からなのか、思索にふけっていたからなのかはわからない。船に戻った彼女は数日間、宿舎にあるイーゼルの前で過ごすが…キャンバスは手つかずのままだった。
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Lady Cassia spent a great deal of time in the mirror mountains — one cannot say whether it was in awe or contemplation. Upon her return to the ship, she spent several days in her quarters in front of her easel... but the canvas remained unmarked.

traits.locale_text: 寄港地での休暇は何事もなく過ぎ去り、船員たちはその後何週間もそのことを話していた。カシア嬢は鏡の山で多くの時間を過ごした。それが畏敬の念からなのか、思索にふけっていたからなのかはわからない。船に戻った彼女は数日間、宿舎にあるイーゼルの前で過ごすが…キャンバスは手つかずのままだった。

languages.text: Der Landgang verlief ohne Zwischenfälle, und die Offiziere des Schiffs sprachen noch wochenlang darüber. Lady Cassia verbrachte sehr viel Zeit in den Spiegelbergen. Ob aus ehrfürchtigem Staunen oder zur inneren Einkehr, das vermag niemand zu sagen. Nach ihrer Rückkehr auf das Schiff blieb sie tagelang in ihrem Quartier, vor ihrer Staffelei ... doch die Leinwand blieb unbefleckt.
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Lady Cassia spent a great deal of time in the mirror mountains — one cannot say whether it was in awe or contemplation. Upon her return to the ship, she spent several days in her quarters in front of her easel... but the canvas remained unmarked.

traits.locale_text: Der Landgang verlief ohne Zwischenfälle, und die Offiziere des Schiffs sprachen noch wochenlang darüber. Lady Cassia verbrachte sehr viel Zeit in den Spiegelbergen. Ob aus ehrfürchtigem Staunen oder zur inneren Einkehr, das vermag niemand zu sagen. Nach ihrer Rückkehr auf das Schiff blieb sie tagelang in ihrem Quartier, vor ihrer Staffelei ... doch die Leinwand blieb unbefleckt.

languages.text: La permission se déroule sans accrocs et les officiers du vaisseau en parlent encore des semaines plus tard. Dame Cassia resta un long moment dans les montagnes-miroirs, bien que personne ne sache pourquoi. De retour dans le vaisseau, elle passa plusieurs jours dans ses quartiers devant son chevalet... mais la toile resta vierge.
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Lady Cassia spent a great deal of time in the mirror mountains — one cannot say whether it was in awe or contemplation. Upon her return to the ship, she spent several days in her quarters in front of her easel... but the canvas remained unmarked.

traits.locale_text: La permission se déroule sans accrocs et les officiers du vaisseau en parlent encore des semaines plus tard. Dame Cassia resta un long moment dans les montagnes-miroirs, bien que personne ne sache pourquoi. De retour dans le vaisseau, elle passa plusieurs jours dans ses quartiers devant son chevalet... mais la toile resta vierge.

languages.text: İniş sonrasında hiçbir sorun yaşanmıyor ve gemi subayları, sonrasında haftalarca buradan bahsediyor. Leydi Cassia, ayna gibi dağlarda çok zaman geçirse de huşu mu hissediyor yoksa tefekküre mi dalıyor söylemek güç. Gemiye döndükten sonraki birkaç gününü odasında, şövalesinin önünde geçiriyor... Gelgelelim tuvale dokunmuyor.
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Lady Cassia spent a great deal of time in the mirror mountains — one cannot say whether it was in awe or contemplation. Upon her return to the ship, she spent several days in her quarters in front of her easel... but the canvas remained unmarked.
